summary: November 1998: A young man swears he committed a heinous crime, he looks in the news, but nobody talks about what happened, even when the police find the alleged victims ... alive and ... See full summary »
cast: Maaya Sakamoto|Kenichi Suzumura|Takako Honda|Jôji Nakata|Kôji Yusa|Tetsuya Kakihara|Ayumi Fujimura|Miki Itô|Jin Yamanoi|Makoto Yasumura|Daisuke Matsuo|Kenichi Saeki|Manabu Sakamaki|Takayuki Masuda|Tatsuya Kamijo|Yûdai Satô
director: Directors: Takayuki Hirao, Takahiro Miura (as Takaaki Hirao)
title: Gekijô ban Kara no kyôkai: Dai go shô - Mujun rasen
